p.span: This industry is made for architects that sell all kind of architectural services such as feasibility studies, schematic design, design development, worksite follow-up, energy efficiency assessment.

ul.li: Project App: Orchestrate complex architectural projects by managing distinct phases like schematic design, development, and construction.
Timesheets App: Ensure profitability by accurately tracking time spent on design drafting, client meetings, and site visits.
CRM App: Centralize client interactions to effectively manage leads and convert design proposals into signed contracts.
Documents App: Securely organize, version, and share critical files such as architectural drawings, permits, and blueprints.
Sales App: Create professional proposals and contracts tailored for architectural services, streamlining the agreement process.
Invoicing App: Maintain healthy cash flow by billing clients flexibly based on project milestones or actual time spent.
Knowledge App: Centralize design standards, building codes, and internal guidelines to ensure consistency across the team.
Leads get created in the CRM by filling the "Contact us" form of the website or manually by the salesperson.

li.span: Automated actions have been created to create activities at appropriated times (an action to call the lead is created when there's a new opportunity, a to-do action is generated when the opportunity is at the "needs analysis stage", a reminder and activity to cancel opportunity are created when the quotation is sent)

From the opportunity, a quote can simply be created using the "create quote" button, and using one of the pre-created quotation template (services and quantities can be suited to the client's request)

ul.li: A set of architectural services have already been created and can be edited to match the architects' services.

li.span: Thanks to the services configuration, a project gets created automatically once the quote is confirmed by the customer. A set of tasks are created in this project, based on the sale order lines.

ul.li: There is also a map view for the projects (projects are assigned a partner based on the projects location, either with the address or with the geolocation if there's no assigned address yet)

Use the documents app to store and share all project documents. Sub-workspaces get created for each project, and link to these sub-workspace can be shared with customers so that they have a direct access to all produced documents.

li.span: Set a cost on each employee and use the Expense application to record project expenses. It's not just about labor and materials, but also about tracking the costs of those undercover subcontractors and any other project-related expenses. Open up the profitability report for your project, and there you'll see budgeted costs, actual costs, revenues, and profit margins. This will help you to figure out how to boost your profit.
